channel.title: ~/Lightro Server Making Team/~ - Nets
channel.description:
[b]NOTE!!: NEVER EVER BUY ANY PROJECTS FROM ANYONE BUT ME (NETS)!
--[b]About Lightro[/b]--
Lightro is a new private server source developing team that makes sources for the public. Lightro will distribute for free [b]and[/b] sell their projects depending on the time put into it.
--[b]Application[/b]-- [i] First name: Nickname: Any experience with other coding teams: Why do you want this job: Servers you have coded/coded for: Will you join forums: Do you know me (Nets)?: Are you honest: Are you respectful: [/i]
--[b]Forums[/b]-- http://s8.invisionfree.com/Lightro/
--[b]Team Code of Conduct:[/b]-- [i]1. I [b]WILL NOT[/b] sell any projects we have made. If we have made a project that is declared free by me (Nets), you [b]WILL[/b] get banned from the development team. 2. I [b]WILL NOT[/b] sell projects we make even if they are supposed to be sold. I (Nets) will do all selling and will split money throughout the team how I wish. 3. I [b]WILL NOT[/b] flame any newcomers in this developing team and/or on this thread. 4. I [b]WILL NOT[/b] listen to any announcements made by anyone but Nets unless Nets says they can. 5. I [b]WILL[/b] follow [b]ALL[/b] of the rules from the following link on the forums, thread, and anywhere regarding this development team: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,56932.0.html.[/i]
--[b]Current Project[/b]-- [u]NetsScape Version Learning - FREE Learning Source[/u] [b]Information:[/b]
This project will be named [b]NetsScape Version Learning[/b]. It will be focused on being a server source that will help out new coders learn how to code more than any other server source ever did. It will have premium comments and suggestions, and even full tutorials on how to add things! Think about it, you don't know how to add something, and it will say it [b]RIGHT THERE[/b]!
--[b]Current Status[/b]-- [i]5%[/i] NetsScape is looking good so far. Very premium help and comments built into it, I even put whole tutorials in there on adding things. It will be an awesome server for newcomers to learn how to code.
--[b]Developing Team[/b]--
[u]Creator/Head Coder/Owner/Boss[/u] [i] - Nets[/i] [u]Chief of Developers[/u] [i] - Applicable[/i] [u]Developers[/u] [i]- Applicable - Applicable - Applicable [/i]

item.title: ~/Lightro Server Making Team/~ - Nets
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

NetsScape is looking good so far. Very premium help and comments built into it, I even put whole tutorials in there on adding things. It will be an awesome server for learning to intermediate coders. Stay tuned for maybe more information.

[b]NOTE!!: NEVER EVER BUY ANY PROJECTS FROM ANYONE BUT ME (NETS)!

–About Lightro–

Lightro is a new private server source developing team that makes sources for the public. Lightro will distribute for free and sell their projects depending on the time put into it.

–Application–

–Forums–
http://s8.invisionfree.com/Lightro/

–Team Code of Conduct:–
1. I WILL NOT sell any projects we have made. If we have made a project that is declared free by me (Nets), you WILL get banned from the development team.
2. I WILL NOT sell projects we make even if they are supposed to be sold. I (Nets) will do all selling and will split money throughout the team how I wish.
3. I WILL NOT flame any newcomers in this developing team and/or on this thread.
4. I WILL NOT listen to any announcements made by anyone but Nets unless Nets says they can.
5. I WILL follow ALL of the rules from the following link on the forums, thread, and anywhere regarding this development team: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,56932.0.html.

–Current Project–
NetsScape Version Learning - FREE Learning Source
Information:

This project will be named NetsScape Version Learning. It will be focused on being a server source that will help out new coders learn how to code more than any other server source ever did. It will have premium comments and suggestions, and even full tutorials on how to add things! Think about it, you don’t know how to add something, and it will say it RIGHT THERE!

–Current Status–
5%
NetsScape is looking good so far. Very premium help and comments built into it, I even put whole tutorials in there on adding things. It will be an awesome server for newcomers to learn how to code.
